name: SHARDA SEWA SANSTHAN
briefDescription: Sharda Sewa Sansthan- (SSS) is one of the grass root organization working in eastern UP. SSS conceptualized by the student group of research & social work and it is registered under society registration act, 21, 1860 in 2009. Its focus agenda of development to stop the violence against deprived community ie women, Dalit, children and other social excluded peoples through need based resilience relief and services. In the cooperation and support of civil society individuals and groups, SSS facilitating the rural development activities in 5 district Varanasi, Mau, Ballia, Ghazipur and Chandauli. Our approach is to collectivized the community on their issues and facilitate to them to prepare their own development. We belief that community based plan and intervention for sustainable development.
